title: Hardwood-style flooring, Large Closets, Washer/Dryer
posting_body: You will find premier one, two, and three-bedroom apartments at Sonoma Resort at Saddle Rock.
As a resident, you will enjoy living in an exceptional location on the Saddle Rock Golf Course.
Our pet-friendly apartments in Aurora, Colorado, also puts you within close proximity to a wide range of neighborhood locales.
The immediate access to Arapahoe Road and the Southlands Shopping Mall is perfect for residents who do not want to travel far to take care of the shopping.
Additionally, the property is near trusted grocery stores, the area’s best schools, and the Denver International Airport.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
Please call or email us today for updated pricing and availability.
